app/app/(dashboard)/worker/jobs/page.tsx.description: Existing worker dashboard page showing structure pattern: uses 'use client', useAuth() hook, inline styles for layout, stats cards grid. This is the pattern to follow for the new bookings page.

lib/supabase/types.ts.description: Database types defined for Supabase tables. Key tables for bookings: bookings (status: pending/accepted/rejected/in_progress/completed/cancelled), jobs (title, budget, address), businesses (name, is_verified). Types should be imported for booking data.

components/ui/.description: Shadcn/ui components available: Card, Button, Badge, Table, Dialog. All use cn() utility for class merging and support variant prop for styling. These should be used instead of inline styles where possible.

middleware.ts.description: Protected routes are defined in protectedRoutes array. New route '/dashboard/worker/bookings' must be added to this array for authentication protection.
